name: East London Mosque
description: The East London Mosque is one of the largest mosques in the UK, serving as a center for religious, social, and cultural activities. It is located in the heart of London's East End and welcomes thousands of worshippers daily.

name: Birmingham Central Mosque
description: Birmingham Central Mosque is one of the largest mosques in the UK and a key landmark in the Birmingham Muslim community. The mosque hosts regular prayers, educational programs, and community outreach events.

name: Finsbury Park Mosque
description: Finsbury Park Mosque, located in North London, is an iconic mosque known for its diverse community and wide range of educational and social programs. It also plays a significant role in interfaith dialogue.

name: The Manchester Central Mosque
description: Manchester Central Mosque serves as a focal point for the city's Muslim community. It hosts daily prayers and provides services for education, charity, and social development.

name: Nottingham Central Mosque
description: Nottingham Central Mosque is a vibrant mosque serving the local Muslim community in Nottingham. The mosque provides a range of religious services, including daily prayers, educational programs, and charity work.

name: Leeds Grand Mosque
description: Leeds Grand Mosque is the largest mosque in Leeds and one of the largest in the UK. It plays a significant role in the local community, providing worship services, educational programs, and social activities.
